related_questions.question: How much do managed services cost?
related_questions.snippet: In general, the price range for managed IT services packages in the US and Canada run from $150- per month to $400 per user, per month. In this case, “per user” refers to employees who use technology to do their job.

related_questions.question: What is the average cost of outsourcing?
related_questions.snippet: In most cases, the average cost per call equals $1 per minute. The price depends on various fees, such as indirect labor expenses. Thus, a thousand 5-minute calls will cost around five thousand dollars. The amount of money your company invests in an outsourced call center affects the fee per call/minute.

related_questions.question: How to charge for outsourcing services?
related_questions.snippet: Outsourcing providers use different pricing models, and choosing the right one can impact your overall costs. Some charge per hour, while others offer fixed rates or pay-per-task structures. Some even offer tiered pricing, where costs vary based on service level.
